description: A small island in the East Blue where Koala and her mother Muti live. The Sun Pirates returned Koala to this island after freeing her from slavery.

keyEvents.title: Sun Pirates Arrive at Foolshout Island
keyEvents.description: The Sun Pirates bring Koala to Foolshout Island to reunite her with her family.
keyEvents.significance: The arrival sets up both the joyful reunion and the tragic betrayal that follows.

keyEvents.title: Koala Reunites with Her Mother
keyEvents.description: Koala is emotionally reunited with her mother Muti on Foolshout Island after years of enslavement.
keyEvents.significance: Provides emotional closure for Koala's rescue while setting up the villagers' betrayal.

keyEvents.title: Villagers Betray Fisher Tiger
keyEvents.description: The villagers of Foolshout Island contact the Marines and reveal Fisher Tiger's location in exchange for the Marines not returning Koala to the Celestial Dragons.
keyEvents.significance: This betrayal leads directly to Tiger's death and exemplifies the cycle of fear between humans and fish-men.

keyEvents.title: Marine Ambush at Foolshout Island
keyEvents.description: Rear Admiral Strawberry and a fleet of Marines ambush Fisher Tiger as he returns to his ship from Foolshout Island.
keyEvents.significance: The ambush results in Tiger's mortal wounds and eventual death.
